text: Nimen zhong you shei xihuan ziji youyige zhong man hai zao he putao, xia lin zhu he, neng chuchan henduo guoshi de yuanpu, zai ziji yi laomai, er ernu haishi youxiao de shihou, zaoyu xie huo de xuanfeng, ba ziji de yuanpu, shaohui wuyi ne? An la wei nimen zheyang chanming xuduo jixiang, yibian nimen siwei
